SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Wow, this building is HUGE! Also, I saw
those vehicles there in Miyako City—
I think they were called 'trains'? I mean, cool and all, but not sure I
can expect much mana out of this world.

SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text: S'cuse me, mister! Where am I?

SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Train_Conductor
SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Why, whatever could it be but
the majestic Avalon Station! Did you miss your transfer, ma'am? If so, we'll
get you sorted in a jiffy, for Avalon Station
is the terminus and starting point for every
rail line, and one can get anywhere from here!

SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text: For real? Good to know. Thanks!

SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.text:
So I guess I'm in Avalon.
Now where could my cat be...?

SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.speaker: Train_Conductor
SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.text:
Welcome to Avalon Station,
good miss!

SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_01.text:
Avalon, huh? Doubt I'll find much mana
in this world, but there should at least
be a kitty for me somewhere.

SUB_W09_SCAN_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_SCAN_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Well, and here I thought it was going to
have me ride somewhere on this thing. Well, since I'm here, I might as well
see the sights. Hope you're ready to
play tour guide, Mr. Green Line!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_00.text:
Wow, look at all the people! Wish I could
just use my magic to soar over all this
hustle and bustle.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_02.text:
Huh? Who are you?
Also, who said I was lost?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_03.text:
You look plenty lost to me, dear—and like
a bit of an odd duck, if I'm honest. Now then, my name is Guinevere, and I have
been tasked by the Crown with fetching
lostlings such as yourself and providing
them guidance.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_04.text:
Huh. Well, my name's Ameya Aisling—
and while I'm still pretty sure I'm
not lost, I AM looking for a lost cat.
Do you know anything about that?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_05.text:
Whether this cat you seek is here or not,
you've an obligation to the Crown to discharge.
Think of it as an entry tax, if you will—and I
do look forward to your prompt payment.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_06.text:
Oh, but please be at ease! I understand you've
nothing on your person which might be of value
to the Crown, so we'd be simply chuffed to
offer you a different means of payment.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_07.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_07.text:
Okay, wait. Hang on. A TAX!?
Are you saying I owe you something
just because I came to your world?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_08.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_08.text:
I am saying precisely that.
Now then, you may pay your
entry tax by gathering these:

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_09.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_09.text:
They are valuable rocks
known as 'diamonds.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_10.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_10.text:
You will go forth and gather items of value
on the streets of Avalon. Said items will
then be converted into diamonds by way of
a secret process known only to the Crown. But I shall spare you the details,
for we've wasted enough time
discussing it already.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_11.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_11.text:
...Okay? So what's with all
these little slips of paper?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_12.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_12.text:
Those, my dear, are transportation tickets.
You will use them to travel about the city,
ideally gathering items of value as you do. I'll leave it to you to figure out how
best to make use of them, for that decision
will be the crux of making this a most
successful enterprise.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_13.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_13.text:
Really? Neat! I mean, I'd been hoping to
see the city anyway, so that's convenient. Er, but I still don't know much about
what items are valuable. Give me a hint!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_14.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_14.text:
Were I you, I might perhaps start at the
Canuds department store; I hear one can
acquire rather valuable items there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_15.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_110_CUT_000_15.text:
And I need to use these tickets
to get there, right? Well then,
I'll give it a shot! Off I go!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_210_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_210_CUT_000_00.text:
THERE you are! I came here
to meet you, you know!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_210_CUT_000_01.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_210_CUT_000_01.text:
A grafting right off the cuff?
This lostling certainly is assertive! Yes, well, my name is Guinevere,
and I have been tasked by the Crown
with fetching lostlings such as
yourself and providing them guidance.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_210_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_210_CUT_000_02.text:
Well, my name's Ameya Aisling,
and I'm looking for a lost cat.
Do you know anything about that?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_210_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_210_CUT_000_03.text:
Whether this cat you seek is here or not,
you've a duty to the Crown to discharge.
Specifically, I need you to gather these:

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_210_CUT_000_09.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_210_CUT_000_09.text:
Were I you, I might perhaps start at the
Canuds department store; I hear one can
acquire rather valuable items there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_01.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_01.text:
A moment, miss? I'm Detective Inspector Spear
from Avalon Yard—and if I may, you're as
dodgy a fellow as I've seen in all my years.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_02.text:
Then you need to meet more witches,
because I'm perfectly normal by
their standards.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_03.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_03.text:
Clearly my intuition's as sharp as ever—
because if there's a dodgier way to
respond to an accusation of dodginess,
I can't imagine what it might be. Lucky for us both, a right dodgy lostling
such as yourself is precisely what I
need at the moment.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_04.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_04.text:
As it happens, I know a number of types who
used to be lostlings—scouted by the queen
herself back in the day, so they were. Point is, miss, I need your help—and you are
going to give it to me, because otherwise
I'll see you thrown in the nick.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_05.text:
Hey, no need for the weird threats—
if you need help, I'm happy to give it.
So what do you want me to do?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_06.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_06.text:
There's a clever lass. Now then, what I need is
for you to put that keen judgement and lostling
power to work locating certain bits and bobs
on the mean streets of Avalon. I know that might seem like a load of old
cobblers at the moment, but it'll all make
sense at the end of the day.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_07.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_07.text:
Um, okay? And you're giving me
little slips of paper...why?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_08.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_08.text:
'Slips of paper'!? Blimey, this is
gonna be a right mess here... These, miss, are called tickets.
You use them to get around the city.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_09.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_09.text:
Really? Neat! I'd been hoping to see the
city anyway. Oh, but you need to give me
a hint about what sort of 'articles'
you're looking for here.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_10.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_10.text:
Oh, I've hints in spades, miss.
For starters, take a peek 'round
the World Theatre, then make
your way over to Avalon Yard.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_11.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_11.text:
Jack Street, next to us, is chock-full
of hooligans and cutpurses. Wouldn't normally send a green young
lady like yourself to that place, but I think
you'll find a piece there that's key to our
little investigation.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_12.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_12.text:
Oh, and then there's the Royal Plaza.
You'll mostlike find a minstrel there
performing for tourists, and I wager
he'll have a clue as well.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_13.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_13.text:
You say you're a witch, yes? If so,
I assume you can take care of yourself
with your cauldrons and newts and whatnot,
so good luck out there. Oh, and mum's the word on this investigation,
so don't go discussing it with any Sid or Nancy who
wanders by. In fact, just don't go discussing it at all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_14.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_14.text:
Okay, I barely understood a word of that—
but the more of the city I see, the better
the chances of finding my cat, so off I go!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh! This is the station where I started!
I guess this is where I end up when I use
all my tickets.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Made it back safely, did you lostling?
Well done! Now be a dear and show me
all the valuable items you've gathered
so I can turn them into diamonds.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_020.text:
Heavens, this is simply brilliant!
That was merely meant to be a training
course, yet you managed to gather more
than any lostling I've ever known!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, this is smashing! If you can get these
sorts of results from the training course,
you'll have your tax sorted in no time—
and maybe even an audience with His Majesty.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_040.text: Well, better than a swift kick in the bum, I suppose. Still, this was just a training course, so as long as you show better results on the real thing, it should all be grand.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, that's gone all to pot—and you were
only on the training course! At this rate,
it's hard to imagine you'll ever discharge
your duty to the Crown. Were I you, I'd do it again—and take it
seriously this time, unless you fancy being
tossed into the royal dungeons.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_060.text:
Now then, if you feel you adequately
understand your duty, you may proceed
to the next course. Or if you still lack for
confidence, you can try this one again.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_090.text:
Hey, this ring didn't turn into diamonds!
Does that mean it isn't worth anything?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_100.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_110_CUT_000_100.text:
This old gold ring here, you mean?
Yes, that is a bit of a mystery.
Must be something of a special case.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_210_CUT_000_110.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_210_CUT_000_110.text:
Did you not bother visiting Canuds?
Or perhaps you simply failed to find
anything of value there? Either way,
I suggest you try again—and harder.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_00.text:
So what happens to all
those diamonds now?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_01.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_01.text:
They will be presented to the Crown
as your entry tax and used to fund
various aspects of the royal family. For while the Crown's finances are handled
by the government, these diamonds need not
be 'officially' accounted for.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_02.text:
I'm not sure what you mean by that,
but it sure sounded like you were
making some big air quotes.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_03.text:
What I'm saying, love, is that these
diamonds are a major source of income
for the royal family. On the rare occasion a lostling appears,
they're sent to gather valuables for the
royal family's benefit—and it is my job
to see it all goes down swimmingly.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_04.text:
Wow! I guess you must be a really
important person for Avalon, huh?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_05.speaker: Guinevere

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_06.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_06.text:
Right then! You'll be on a different course
next time, and may end up visiting more
dangerous places and encountering even
dodgier individuals—so do take care.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_07.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_07.text:
Okay, but can I get
another hint first?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_08.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_08.text:
Begin with Nobleman's Square. It's where
the nobility of Albion tend to congregate,
but commoners may visit without issue.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_09.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_120_CUT_000_09.text:
Heh. Makes sense the nobility would have
valuable stuff falling out of their pockets.
I'll go check it out.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_220_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_220_CUT_000_00.text:
So what are you going to do
with that ring from before?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_220_CUT_000_01.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_220_CUT_000_01.text:
I will have it appraised so I might see
if it is worth presenting to the king—
in truth, I suspect it may have even
greater value than the diamonds.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_220_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_220_CUT_000_02.text:
Do those sorts of things
turn up often?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_220_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_220_CUT_000_03.text:
Never, my little lostling—and it
makes me suspect you might be a
terrifically special young lady indeed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_220_CUT_000_08.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_220_CUT_000_08.text:
Try Nobleman's Square. It's where Albion's
nobility tends to congregate, but commoners
may visit without issue. And of course, such nobles are known
to possess precious items.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_220_CUT_000_09.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_220_CUT_000_09.text:
Precious items, huh? Can't even begin
to imagine what that might mean...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_000.text:
I feel like I'm getting the
hang of these Avalon streets!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_020.text:
Heavens, this is simply brilliant!
Have you been to Avalon before?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, this is just smashing!
Let's keep it up, shall we?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_040.text:
Better than a swift kick in the bum,
I suppose—though I encourage you
to try harder next time.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, this has gone all to pot. At this rate,
you're mere moments from being tossed into
the royal dungeons—and I've not the faintest
what might happen to you after that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_060.text:
Your fate is yours to decide.
Do you wish to try again?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_090.text:
So the necklace didn't turn into diamonds?
Rats! Must be because of the curse.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_100.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_120_CUT_000_100.text:
This old gold necklace here, you mean?
Yes, it does appear to be something
of a special case.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_220_CUT_000_110.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_220_CUT_000_110.text:
You didn't visit Nobleman's Square?
Or did you merely run into trouble
with the nobles, perhaps? *sigh* I fear I may have expected rather
too much from a mere lostling...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_00.text:
Okay, so exactly ZERO of the items I got at
the places you recommended became diamonds!
What's up with that, huh?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_01.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_01.text:
Yes, that is rather a sticky wicket.
They're gold and rather old, but I haven't had
issues with such things not becoming diamonds
before, and I can't speak to why it might be. Perhaps His Highness might have some
insight into the matter. Or perchance...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_02.text:
Are you, um, gonna finish
that sentence?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_03.text:
I don't know. Am I? Yes, well, the next course will be the last.
Do try to complete one final circuit before
your lostling power dissipates completely.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_03.text:
The next course will be the last.
Do try to complete one last circuit before
your validity as a lostling expires.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_05.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_05.text:
If lostlings were to generate too many
diamonds, their value would crater overnight.
This is why we require but a single lostling
at any given time, you see.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_06.text:
Okay, question: can't you just make the
diamonds yourself? Why do you need to
rely on lostlings for this whole thing?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_07.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_07.text:
Was I not clear? This is a power possessed
by lostlings; we could not do it without you.
It is what makes you ever so valuable.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_08.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_08.text:
Now then, this route will be rather
different: it begins at the royal palace,
and will likewise conclude there once
you make a full circuit of the city.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_10.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_130_CUT_000_10.text:
Do you truly require one? I wonder...
Regardless, I would think it worth your
while to pop by the Royal Museum of Albion. As a visitor to our land,
I'm certain you will find it
quite the fascinating place.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_00.text:
So the items I got at Nobleman's Square and
Canuds both didn't turn into diamonds—
and both of those were locations you
strongly hinted I should visit. I'm starting to wonder if the
'terrifically special' one here
is actually you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_01.text: Now tell me what's going on!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_02.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_02.text: And that is precisely why you are so very special, Ameya Aisling: it seems I can hide nothing from your clever mind.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_03.text:
Well, then! If explanations you want,
explanations you shall have. Some time ago, I committed a crime.
As recompense, I was ordered to find
lostlings and use them to collect diamonds,
which I then offer up to His Majesty. Having now performed this service for no
small amount of time, I feel I have
sufficiently atoned for my actions.
And yet...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_04.text:
And yet the king feels otherwise.
So what are you going to do?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_05.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_05.text:
Ever one step ahead, aren't you? But yes,
it is as you say: I am gathering gold items
to which the king's power does not extend
so I might use them to barter my freedom.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_06.text:
Little hard to imagine you winning back your
freedom so easily, but hey, what do I know?
So, uh, how many more do you need?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_07.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_07.text:
If I can acquire just one more,
I think that should prove sufficient.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_10.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_230_CUT_000_10.text:
Oh, I cannot imagine you require
any hint I might have to offer.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_000.text:
Back at the royal palace at last.
I guess I get to see the king now?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_010.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_010.text:
That will depend on how many diamonds you
have gathered. Let's have a gander and see if
His Majesty will be chuffed to bits or tossing
you into his gaol.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, it's better than a swift kick
in the bum, I suppose.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_050.text: Well, this has gone all to pot.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_060.text:
It appears you can safely expect
His Majesty's gratitude. Now let us
take these diamonds into the palace.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_070.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_070.text:
Let us take these diamonds into the palace.
As for what will happen next, we'll simply
have to see what mood His Majesty is in.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_080.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_080.text:
This scant quantity of diamonds buys
you nothing but a one-way ticket
to the royal dungeons.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_120.text:
I got this wand at the museum, but I guess
it's not worth much if it can't be turned into
diamonds. It DID strike me as a rather
unusual item, though.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_130.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_130_CUT_000_130.text:
An old golden wand, is it?
Yes, that's exactly the sort of thing
which cannot be turned to diamonds.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_230_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_230_CUT_000_000.text: So this where I meet the king?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_230_CUT_000_140.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_230_CUT_000_140.text:
No wand, I see. This speaks volumes
about your intentions, Ameya Aisling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_230_CUT_000_150.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_230_CUT_000_150.text:
And cheers for bringing me the
third golden item I required.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome back, Lady Guinevere.
'Tis a pleasure to see you again.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_000_010.text:
The pleasure is all mine, good sir.
I've a lostling here who stands
ready to pay her entry tax.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Excellent work, lostling.
You may enter.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_000_030.text:
And if I may be so bold, Lady Guinevere,
I eagerly look forward to the day you
might return to the palace for good.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_000_040.text: Wait, you used to live here?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Ancient history, I'm afraid.
Now I'm naught but a captive criminal.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_000.text:
This fine offering of diamonds
pleases me, lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_010.text:
If you require a boon, merely name it
and I shall see it done.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_020.text:
Well, sire, I came to this world in search
of a cat, and I'd like to search for it.
Soon as I find it, I'm outta here.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_030.text:
As you have made an offering worthy of
such a request, your boon is granted.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_040.text:
Your efforts in this matter are
appreciated as well, Guinevere.
You may go now.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_050.text:
A moment please, Your Majesty! I have guided a great many lostlings
and secured for you a stunning amount
of diamonds in the process. As such,
I believe I have earned your forgiveness.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_060.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_060.text:
There can be no forgiveness for one who
betrays their own king! Nay, girl, your
atonement will consume a lifetime.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_070.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_070.text:
I do not ask to cease my atonement,
Your Highness. I ask only for freedom,
for that is all I have ever wanted.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_080.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_080.text:
What is the meaning of this, Guinevere?
Would you seek to defy me once more?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_090.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_090.text:
While no subject of Albion can defy their king,
this lostling has shown me your power does not
extend to otherworldly articles such as these.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_100.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_100.text:
You would use these trinkets to
diminish His Majesty's power?
How clever...and how foolish!
Guards! Seize this traitor!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_110.text: Soooo... I can just leave, then?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_120.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_120.text:
We cannot apprehend Lady Guinevere!
We'll not turn our arms against
our rightful queen!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_130.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_130.text:
Fie, more traitors in our midst!
But so be it—if you will not follow my
command, you may join her in death!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_010_140.text:
Okay, so clearly sneaking out
of here isn't going to work.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_020_000.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_020_000.text:
I love you, Guinevere my queen—which is
exactly why I cannot forgive your crime. But I am a merciful man, and so will permit
the freedom you desire in the form of exile.
Now begone from here and never return!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_020_020.text:
I leave Lady Guinevere
in your hands, lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_020_030.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_020_030.text: Please take care of m'lady, miss!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_020_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_020_040.text:
I mean, I will, but kinda presumptuous
of you all to dump her on me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_020_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_100_CUT_020_050.text:
Continue your mission, lostling—
and without delay.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_000_000.text:
Greetings, Lady Guinevere. I am surprised
you have chosen to visit us again. Yet would it not be best to accept His Majesty's
judgment that you will not be forgiven and
cannot escape his power, even with the aid
of your skilled lostling?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Guinevere

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_000_030.text:
Even the gatekeepers greet me as a
nuisance now—but that ends today.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_000_040.text: Hey, gotta give it a shot, right?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_000_050.text:
I pray you might support me
in this, lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_010_050.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_010_050.text:
I am going nowhere, Your Majesty!
Today is the day I win my freedom!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_010_060.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_010_060.text:
Must we go through with this farce again?
A subject of Albion may not defy their king!
What will it take for that to sink in?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_010_070.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_010_070.text:
Ah, but this time
I come prepared...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_010_080.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_010_080.text:
With this barrier, your royal powers
cannot touch me—indeed, none of you
foul cretins can hope to stop me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_010_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_010_100.text: Oh boy, this could go REAL wrong...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_020_000.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_020_000.text:
You have betrayed me, lostling,
and I will not stand for it!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_020_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_020_010.text:
I only did what I thought
was right, sire!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_020_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_020_020.text:
Are you unharmed, Your Majesty?
Er, sorry for sticking my nose in this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_020_030.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_020_030.text:
Death cannot hold Queen Guinevere for long,
lostling, so there is nothing to regret.
But you do have my gratitude for your actions.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_020_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_020_040.text:
Well that's a relief! Also, next time
you two fight, maybe take it down
a notch? Anyway, byeeee!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_000.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_000.text:
I love you, Guinevere my queen—which is
exactly why I cannot forgive your crime.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_010.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_010.text:
If you look to kill me, simply call
the headsman and be done with it.
Then this farce will finally be over,
which is all any of us want.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_020.text:
If anyone must be punished,
Your Majesty, let it be me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_030.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_030.text:
Lancelot? What are you doing here?
There's no point in your dying as well!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_040.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_040.text:
There can be no going back to our
younger days when we could so readily
forgive each other our trespasses. Nay, we'll not know such until the day our
god calls us home. But on that day, I look
forward to talking and laughing together
as once we did.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_050.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_050.text:
Now leave my sight, the both of you.
And you stand down as well, lostling—
and go with my gratitude for all that
you have done this day.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_060.text: So what are you two gonna do next?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_070.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_070.text:
I will return to hiding and protect the
kingdom from the shadows, as is my duty.
I ask only that you might take care of
the queen in my stead, lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_090.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_090.text:
Would you even have me, lostling?
Especially after I fought you and was
then rendered powerless?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_200_CUT_030_100.text:
Yeah, of course I would.
Come on and join me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_110_CUT_010_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_110_CUT_010_050.text:
You didn't end up getting anything
from His Majesty, Guinevere.
Are you okay with that?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_110_CUT_010_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_110_CUT_010_060.text:
For today, I shall have to be.
But when the next lostling comes,
surely my wish will be granted.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_110_CUT_010_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_110_CUT_010_070.text:
Uh-oh. Does that mean
I wasn't strong enough?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_110_CUT_010_080.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_110_CUT_010_080.text:
Those are your words, lostling—not mine.
Regardless, it is now time for you to
pursue your own goals elsewhere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_210_CUT_010_080.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_210_CUT_010_080.text:
To be perfectly frank...yes. You weren't.
And because you did not heed my words,
you are now free to do as you will.
Farewell, my failed lostling.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_120_CUT_000_020.text:
Right then, let's take a look.
Blimey, this is a terrible haul! Well, we can't have a plonker
like you wandering the streets of Avalon,
so it's off to the dungeons.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Whaaat? But I worked really hard
gathering all that dumb junk!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_120_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm sorry there was nothing more I could do to
help you, lostling. Alas, I fear I haven't the
faintest idea what becomes of those banished
to the dungeons...but best of luck all the same.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_120_CUT_010_000.text:
I can't believe it! This is all
because of Macha's magic...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_120_CUT_010_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_120_CUT_010_020.text:
Kitty! It's really you! Oh, so THIS must be the reason I
wasn't able to gather many diamonds.
Magic sure is mysterious, huh!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_000.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_000.text:
Well, look who's still in one piece!
Sure am chuffed to see it, miss; Avalon's
full of dangerous places and types, much
as it shames an old bobby like me to admit.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_010.text:
Now then, let's see if your eye for things
has met our expectations. That's what'll
determine whether this investigation
advances or not.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_020.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_020.text:
Blimey, this is a proper haul!
Sure you're playing fair out there?
Oi, you know what? I don't care.
Results are all that matters.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_030.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_030.text:
Now this here's a right cracking job.
His Majesty will be buzzing about this,
and no mistake.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_040.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_040.text:
Eh, bog-standard, I suppose. But try giving
it some welly next time, miss—it'll make
everything run more smoothly down the road.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_050.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_050.text: Blimey, but this is a right dog's dinner! Maybe I wasn't clear the first time—just being a lostling is a crime, and the only way to stay out of the nick is to bring His Majesty diamonds. What you've got here just won't do at all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_060.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_060.text:
Right then! If you feel confident, we'll take
the next step. But if you want to try again,
we'll run it back for you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_090.text:
So no diamonds from the triangle thingy?
'Cause I felt a strange power there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_100.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_100.text:
You're not wrong, miss; these 'triangle thingies'
are vital bits of evidence for our investigation.
Now then, thanks much for your cooperation,
and I hope you'll see fit to keep them coming.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_110.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_110.text:
You're not wrong, miss; these 'triangle thingies'
are vital bits of evidence for our investigation.
In fact, I've a suspicion there's another one
of them still out there somewhere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_120.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_310_CUT_000_120.text:
Didn't find all the triangular objects?
Or could you simply not be arsed to visit
the key sites of this investigation?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_00.text:
So what's the deal with the triangle
thingies? You never did tell me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_01.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_01.text:
Sorry, miss; can't be sharing confidential
details with the likes of you. Just trust me
on this: triangles have the power to change
the fate of this world. ...Or am I just taking the piss
out of you here?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_02.text:
I think I know what that means,
but still. Gross.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_03.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_03.text:
Ha ha ha! Just make sure you
don't let any triangles slip
between your fingers, right?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_04.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_04.text:
Right then! On to the next.
This time, we'll be starting
at Nobleman's Square.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_05.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_05.text:
Your goal is to reach Avalon Station—
and the key site in this part of the
investigation is the Broadcast Tower.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_06.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_320_CUT_000_06.text:
Also, you'll probably run into a pickpocket
or three around these parts. They should
have some useful information, so make sure
to have a proper chinwag with 'em.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_320_CUT_000_020.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_320_CUT_000_020.text: Blimey, this is a proper haul!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_320_CUT_000_030.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_320_CUT_000_030.text: Now this here's a cracking job.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_320_CUT_000_050.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_320_CUT_000_050.text: Now this is a right dog's dinner!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_320_CUT_000_060.speaker: Guinevere
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_320_CUT_000_060.text:
Your fate is yours to decide.
Do you wish to try again?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_320_CUT_000_090.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_320_CUT_000_090.text:
Looks like you found all the triangles,
which means I can wrap up my
investigation all nice and neat.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_00.text:
So there are four triangle thingies
in total, huh? What does that mean
for your investigation, anyway?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_01.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_01.text:
Don't be so hasty there—
still got places I need you
to visit on the next course.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_02.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_02.text:
This one runs from the station
to the royal palace.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_03.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_03.text:
Oh, and stop off at the hospital
on the way. You should be able to
get to the graveyard from there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_04.text:
And what am I going to do
at a graveyard?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_05.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_05.text:
Gravekeeper has some kind of information,
but that's all I know; bloke refused to
talk to a copper.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_06.text:
Maybe he would have be willing
to talk to one who wasn't as
phenomenally sketchy as you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_07.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_000_07.text:
Ha! You've a sharp tongue on you,
miss, but that's a fair read of me. All the same, I think even as winsome a lass
as yourself might find loosening his lips to
be a bit of a challenge—but don't let me down!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_010_00.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_010_00.text:
All right, miss, this is our final course.
I've got nothing what needs investigated,
so just kick back and enjoy everything
Avalon has to offer.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_010_01.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_010_01.text:
Oh, but make sure you don't wind up
in the king's dungeon—still got that
little ace to worry about.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_010_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_330_CUT_010_03.text:
So this is the last lap, then?
Guess I'll give it my all!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, miss? How was it? Goes without saying
I can't have you ending up in the dungeon,
so if you don't meet the king, your problems
are gonna become mine.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_060.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_060.text:
Cor, you really cracked on here, miss!
His Majesty should be proper satisfied,
so let's get these diamonds to the palace.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_070.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_070.text:
Eh, nothing for it but to take your diamonds
to the royal palace and hope His Majesty
is in a forgiving mood.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_080.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_080.text:
You having a laugh here, miss?
'Cause His Majesty's gonna have
you strung up by your thumbs.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_120.text:
So what do I do with my little souvenir
from the graveyard? It didn't turn into 
diamonds, but I can still feel it pulsing
with a bunch of magical energy. I mean, if you don't want it,
I'd be happy to keep it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_130.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_130.text:
Then let's just have you do that for the time
being, miss; looks better in your mitts than
mine, anyhow. Though I reckon that's true of
most things in this world, eh?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ENDING_330_CUT_000_140.text: Okay, sure. I mean, not that I should ever trust anything you say.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_000_000.text:
Out of the way, you daft mug! Got a
lostling here what's got an offering
of diamonds for His Majesty.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_000_010.text:
Not so fast there! Who are you and...
Cor blimey, look at those diamonds!
I've never seen so many before!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_000_020.text:
You really think that's enough
diamonds to let me grant you an
audience with His Majesty!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_000_030.text: What say you look into my eye?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_000_040.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_000_040.text: Oh my giddy aunt! Y-you... You're...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_000_050.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_000_050.text:
We know the way. Oh, and that's some
fine work, mate. Keep it up.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_040.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_040.text:
Please accept my offering as well,
Your Majesty!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_060.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_060.text:
Before those dastards used those strange
triangles to seal it away, this sword
symbolised sovereignty over Albion.
It belongs at your side, Your Majesty.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_070.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_070.text:
By all that's holy... Lancelot!
It's you! You've returned to us!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_080.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_080.text:
I have borrowed the power of this lostling to
break the seal, and am now yours to command.
With this sword, I swear to slay all who might
seek to bring evil to your realm!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_090.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_090.text:
The only one bringing evil to this realm
is you, Lancelot! Or have you forgotten
that you committed the crime of treason
against your own king?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_100.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_100.text:
I am a criminal and do not deny it. But only
the king can pass judgment over me—and
your vile hold over him is first among the
evils that will fall to this blade!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_110.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_110.text:
No matter how much power that sword contains,
no citizen of Albion is able to defy the king.
You should know this more than most, Lancelot.
...Now give him an order, Your Majesty!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_140.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_140.text:
You always were a fool, Lancelot!
Did you truly think to march in here
and slay me like some hero of old?
To beg the forgiveness of your king? Oh, but seeing a man on his knees is a most
unseemly thing—so let me put an end to your
days of pleading by killing you here and now!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_150.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_150.text:
Oh man! If I don't do something,
he's gonna get himself killed!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_180.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_180.text:
I knew this wasn't a normal sword, but wow!
It sorta makes me the most powerful person
in this whole world? I'm honestly not even
sure that I like it...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_190.speaker: Queen_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_190.text:
Keep such thoughts to yourself if you value your
life, you feeble lostling! You may have gathered
power from throughout the Conjoined Worlds,
but this world is ours by right!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_200.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_010_200.text:
Oh, don't you worry—this world has got nothing
to do with me, and I couldn't be less interested
in conquering it. But I'm also not just gonna
hand it over to YOU, either!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_020_000.speaker: King_Albion
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_020_000.text:
Lancelot, my dear friend. I am gladdened to
see you again, and gladdened even more that
you freed me from that woman's cruel yoke.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_020_010.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_020_010.text:
And yet, I am a criminal still. Even if I
did it to safeguard her, the fact remains
I absconded with your queen and
pledged to her my eternal love. I have betrayed my king, and in
so doing proven myself unworthy
to stand at your side.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_020_020.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_020_020.text:
But if ever your life is in danger, I shall be
there—which is why it remains my fervent
hope we never again see each other.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_020_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_020_040.text:
So Lancelot, what are you going to do now?
Er, or am I supposed to keep calling you
Inspector Spear?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_020_050.speaker: Lancelot
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_300_CUT_020_050.text:
I must quit this place for a while;
the king's majesty would only be
diminished by the criminal Lancelot
running about unpunished. Perhaps a certain lostling might consider
letting me accompany her on a journey
through the Conjoined Worlds?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_310_CUT_010_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_310_CUT_010_040.text:
Was that okay? 'Cause it didn't seem like
you got anything you wanted out of that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_310_CUT_010_050.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_310_CUT_010_050.text:
That's the way it goes sometime, miss.
My investigation didn't pan out either.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_310_CUT_010_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_310_CUT_010_060.text: Does that mean I failed you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_310_CUT_010_070.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_310_CUT_010_070.text:
Oh, you did, miss.
You very much did. I'd thought you might suffice, but there's
nothing for it but for me to start over
and try again. Here's hoping you have
better luck with your own goals.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_320_CUT_000_020.speaker: Palace_Guard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_320_CUT_000_020.text:
Right then, let's take a look.
Blimey, this is a terrible haul! Well, we can't have a plonker
like you wandering the streets of Avalon,
so it's off to the dungeons.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_320_CUT_000_040.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_LAST_320_CUT_000_040.text:
You've been angling for a trip to the
dungeons this whole time, lass, and
now you get it. Hope it was worth it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.text:
I wonder what all these people
are lined up for?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.text:
Cheers, love! I'm the songstress!
I'm so glad ye came to see me,
and I hope ye enjoy this wee
signed photoprint!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_000_CUT_0.text:
New song's gonna be a fine one,
so keep yer ears open!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Hello there, love—I'm the songstress!
Cheers for supportin' me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fan_Utahime
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Oh my gosh, I am your BIGGEST fan!
Please take this! PLEASE!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
A gift for me, is it?
Aye, I'll treasure it always.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: And gratitude to you as well, love!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: Huh? Me? Oh, uh... You're welcome?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
To be honest, I've been in a wee strop today,
but gettin' so many gifts from my fans cheered
me up straightaway. Now please just sit back
and enjoy my new song!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
The sun comes up and morning calls.
Without ye, I cannae go on.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Can ye make yer way back to me, O love?
Can ye make yer way back to me?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
So I go to Giant Moch Forest and daren't
look back. Oh no, I daren't look back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: The sun rises away, above me so far.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: I must bear the dark as night falls.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
I'll be off now 'cause
vultures are screechin'.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
I howl in the black!
I'm fiercer than dawn!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Let this fool hop on and
we'll be off, Golden Baum!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text: And I cross the darkness alone.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_010_CUT_0.text:
Aye, singin' that perks me right up.
Thanks so much for listenin'!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.text:
Wow, look how much longer the line is!
That songstress might actually know
what she's doing...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_020_CUT_0.text:
Oh, cheers! 'Tis fine to see ye again!
I've nothin' but this wee token for ye,
but I hope it shows how grateful I am.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.text:
Thank ye all sooo much for comin'!
I'm afraid the signing's over now,
so apologies to anyone in the queue.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.text:
You made it all the way to the front
of the queue at the moment it ended?
Oh, now that's just TERRIBLE luck! You must be gutted, lass! You must be cheesed off!
If it were me, I'd be screamin' to the heavens,
you know? Hell, you must be the most cursed
lady in the entire universe!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.text:
Well, it had to happen to someone...
Although I'm usually such a lucky girl!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_RADIOSTATION_030_CUT_0.text:
Hey, good for you! Stiff upper lip and
all that, eh? Oh, and here's a little
sympathy present from me to you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Welcome, miss. Please take a seat
and I'll pour you a nice fizzy drink.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Oi! I 'eard a rumour what blokes could drink
for free at this 'ere pub—gimme a shot of
the good stuff and keep it comin', bird!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I believe you've entered the
wrong establishment, sir.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Think so, do ya? Well, you got bottles
and I got a thirst, so what bloody
difference does it make?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Unfortunately for you, sir,
we've a new bouncer on the job.
...Ahem. ...AHEM.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_000_060.text:
La de dum de dum de... Wait, huh?
You're talking about ME!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Okay, this is AMAZING!
Can I have another?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_010_010.text:
A fizzy drink? Oh, posh. For that bold display,
I will craft you something from our
world-famous mocktail menu!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_020_000.text:
Hm. It appears I chose the wrong patron
to appoint as our bouncer.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_000_CUT_020_010.text:
Now then, anyone who finds themselves
in the wrong place, please do leave.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Ah, our lucky customer! I've a wager
for you, love: win a game against me,
and I'll double your belongings.
But lose, and it all goes away. Also, as this is your destiny,
there's no getting out of it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Why would I want to get out of that?
I'm practically a lock to win!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_010_CUT_000_020.text:
That confidence makes you my kind of customer.
Now then! If the card's a heart, you win. 
But if it's a joker, the game is mine.
Shall we begin, then?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_010_CUT_010_000.text:
Seems luck is on your side today—
and in a way, the heart on this card
is my own as well. Now go on, love.
Take your winnings.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_010_CUT_010_010.text:
Oh, now that's a right shame: you doubled
up, but actually have nothing to double.
Well, perhaps you'd take my heartfelt
feelings instead, love?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Bartender
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BAR_010_CUT_020_000.text:
Well, I see this fickle clown
is no friend of yours.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome to the Royal Museum of Albion,
young lady! To celebrate our bicentennial,
we are presenting commemorative gifts to
our visitors. I do hope you will accept one.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_010.text: Don't mind if I do, guy. Thanks.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Also, our newest exhibit, 'The Hidden
Treasures Beneath Avalon,' is scheduled
to open in but a few days.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Beneath the streets of Avalon lie not only
lost treasures, but unimaginably terrifying
creatures just waiting to awaken from their
eternal slumber!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
But those, of course, will not be part
of the display. Regardless, please do
come back and see it. Pip pip!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_020.text:
I almost cannot believe this myself,
young lady, but you are this museum's
one BILLIONTH visitor!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Wowzers! I mean, I kinda do believe it,
though, 'cause I really AM that lucky.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm chuffed as chips I lived to see this day,
and must insist you accept this to mark this
most monumental of occasions.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_050.text:
Might I also recommend you visit our
permanent exhibit, 'Magic and Folklore'? It contains numerous archaeological specimens
from throughout the grand history of Albion,
many of which were said to have been preserved
through powerful magic!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_060.text:
It's quite the spectacle, if I do say so myself.
Indeed, upon seeing it, you might even begin to
suspect that I myself am a sorcerer of the most
arcane and powerful type!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_010_CUT_000_070.text:
But that, of course, would be folly,
so please set worry aside and enjoy
the exhibit at your leisure.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_040.text:
To you, our esteemed billionth visitor,
I'm pleased to extend a special invitation
to a behind-the-scenes tour of our newest
exhibit, 'Magic and Folklore'!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Then allow me to present
you with this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_080.text:
Ah, but I did have a reason for inviting
you into our back garden, so to speak:
this golden wand. I debated to the last whether or not
to place it on display, but fearing it
may have been included by mistake,
I chose to remove it from the exhibit.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_090.text:
Probably the right call.
I mean, it's a pretty funky wand.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Ah, I suspected a lostling like yourself might
recognize its power! I beg of you to see that
it finds its way to the good Lady Guinevere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_110.text:
Wait, you KNEW I was a lostling?
So does that mean your whole
'billionth customer' thing was—

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_120.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_120.text:
Shhh! Speak not the remainder of that sentence,
for I feel certain neither of us wishes to see
the fine reputation of the Museum of Albion
dragged through the gutter!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_130.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MUSEUM_020_CUT_000_130.text:
Now if you would be so kind,
take this with you as well.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Police_Inspector
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
Oi! Yer one'a them lostlings, ain'tcha? Well,
we'll be needin' your 'elp with an investigation,
lostling, so I'm gonna go ahead and nick one'a
them lovely little items ya gathered.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Police_Inspector
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
Turns out there's a criminal syndicate what's
using the connection 'tween lostlings and the
royal family to unjustly enrich 'emselves. So we'll be needin' to take a butchers at this
'ere item of yours, see if it's connected to
said criminal syndicate. Now be a good lass
and 'and it over, eh?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Police_Inspector
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_POLICEOFFICE_000_CUT_0.text:
Oi, what's this, lass? You ain't got a damn
thing on ya! Well you're a right crap of a
lostling, ain'tcha? Run along, ya skiver!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Greetings, madam, and welcome to Deeps. 
What can I help you with today? Footwear?
A bag? A fine hat? Or perhaps we could
tailor a new dress specially for you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Or perchance you seek something
else entirely, lostling?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, good, you're on to the whole lostling
dealie. Also, it sounds like you have
something I actually WANT?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
Here at Deeps, we strive to meet our
customers' every desire—and as such,
I trust this item will more than satisfy. Said item, however, is provided as-is,
and solely at the customer's risk.
Caveat emptor, madam!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_000_CUT_.text:
We greatly look forward
to serving you again.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_010_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_010_CUT_.text:
Have you come in search of another
item that might satisfy your needs?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_100_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_100_CUT_.text:
So do you have any cool stuff
that I can only get here?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_100_CUT_.speaker: Avalon_Shopassistant
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SHOPINGSTREET_100_CUT_.text:
Here at Deeps, we strive to meet our
customers' every desire—and as such,
I trust this item will more than satisfy. Said item, however, is provided as-is,
and solely at the customer's risk.
Caveat emptor, madam!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
In times of yore, 'twas the Knights of the
Round that bolstered the kingdom of Albion.
But in this day and age, that mantle has
fallen to we of the nobility.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text: In my world, witches of every color support the Arch Witch, and the Arch Witch supports witches of every color in return. In essence, we witches are Pulchra, so individual rank isn't a big deal.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
Bosh! Flimshaw! Why, I cannot even imagine
living in a place so uncivilised that it lacks
the elites capable of handling the great
burden my fellows and I bear. Rubbish, I say! Unadulterated codswallop!
Perhaps I shall educate you as to what
exactly this great burden consists of!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, good heavens, no!
My stars and garters!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_00.text:
Yiiikes. Guess I've got no choice
but to step in here.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_01.text:
Your assistance was hardly necessary, madam.
Nevertheless, it would be unbecoming of a
nobleman not to make a show of gratitude
for your efforts, so take this trinket.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_02.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_000_CUT_02.text:
Do you understand now the great
burden of the nobility?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.text:
Come closer, my dear lady! Yes, there we are.
Now then, as you can see, I am a nobleman
of the great kingdom of Albion, while you
are but a hardscrabble lostling. Therefore, as befits the great burden of
the aristocracy, I am obligated to grant
you succour. However, if you prefer,
I can also proffer greater hardship.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.text:
I'm pretty sure the result's the same 
either way, so why don't you pick?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_00.text:
I thought you might say as much.
As you wish, then!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_01.text:
Yeah, that's about what I expected.
Also, I won, so make with the succour
or...whatever.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_010_CUT_01.text:
On its way, my dear lady—for we in the
aristocracy are men of our word all!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
As a nobleman of the great kingdom
of Albion, I possess much in the way
of titles and territory. This necklace, however—a family heirloom we
have treasured for generations—means far more
to me than any lands or peerage. But tragically,
the item has a bit of an issue.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text: What, is it cursed or something?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
I'll be hanged! I'd no idea meager
lostlings such as yourself were
capable of discerning such things! Well then, do you also possess the power to
dispel such curses? For that is the burden
which has been imposed upon my house!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
Curses and magic aren't the same,
but I'm happy to give it a shot.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_00.text:
Then I beg of you to do
exactly that, my good lady!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text: Were you able to remove the curse?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text:
I know not—which is why I have decided the best
way to free my family from the necklace's curse
is to part with it entirely. Take it and go,
my wretched lostling, for it is yours now!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text:
So you're giving me a cursed necklace?
Not exactly thrilled about this, but hey,
maybe it was just meant to be.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_01.text:
You speak of fate? A most noble ideal!
Are you yourself a noblewoman, perchance?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_02.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_02.text:
I know not—and yet, it seems my house
has no choice but to carry on and bear
the necklace's curse for all time. I thank you for your cooperation
regardless, lostling, for I know
you gave your all to the effort.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_020_CUT_02.text: Sorry I couldn't be more help.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Rich_Noble
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NOBLESQUARE_030_CUT_00.text:
I am a nobleman of the great kingdom of Albion—
and you, young lady, are a lostling of but
meager renown. As such, pray consider this
my contribution to the kingdom. Huzzah!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
So apparently there's a valuable item here,
but I have ZERO idea how I'm supposed to
figure out which one it is.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Oh dear, just look at that slovenly waif come
here to shop. Some sort of foreigner, perhaps?
Poor ragamuffin must not be aware this shop
deals only in goods of quality.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Well, I think I've seen everything, and
the most valuable item has to be either
the rusty sword, the leather handbag,
or the old gold ring.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Oh my days, what sort of twisted sensibility
is this!? Aside from the leather handbag,
the rest of those items are pure rubbish.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Just look how happy she is to take that useless
old poker! Still, I suppose it's to the good that
our country has such foreigners to happily tote
away all these old bits and bobs.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
My giddy aunt! Did she overhear the
snarky comments I made to myself? Well, that's clearly my good deed for the day;
even a slovenly foreigner shouldn't spend her
hard-grubbed coin on rubbish, after all!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_000_C.text:
Well, I'll be switched! Could it be
that dusty old ring is actually an
item of incredible value? No. No, that couldn't possibly be.
It simply couldn't! ...Could it!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text:
Well, I think I've seen everything, and
the most valuable item has to be either
the musky cologne, the fresh-baked bread,
or the taxidermy bird.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text:
Oh my days, what sort of twisted sensibility
is this!? A bunch of creepy old junk and some
bread? The poor girl clearly has horrible taste—
and also must be rather peckish.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text:
Look how she delights in the smell of beasts.
What sort of life must this wretched waif live?
Oh, but I shudder to imagine it... Ugh, and now
I can't STOP imagining it! Oh, won't someone help me purge
this image from my mind!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text: Well, Canuds does have an excellent bakery— and even if that beggared foreigner wasn't so clearly starving, I doubt she could have resisted the delicious aroma of their oven-fresh bread.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_010_C.text: Well, that's money for old rope, and no mistake. That addled girl must simply adore birds—I cannot imagine another reason for such a bizarre choice.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text:
Well, I think I've seen everything, and
the most valuable item has to be either
the stinky fish eggs, the old gold ring,
or those cookies.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text:
My days, what sort of twisted sensibility is
this? Oh, everyone loves a tin of biscuits to
be certain, but everything else is rubbish.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text:
Why, that's madness! Why would Canuds
even deign to sell something with such
an indescribably foul stench!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_020_C.text: ...A surprisingly reasonable choice for a foreigner. Indeed, that's precisely the sort of item a child of her ilk should be purchasing.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.text:
Well, I think I've seen everything, and
the most valuable item has to be either
the leather handbag, the muddy mushrooms,
or that taxidermy bird.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.speaker: Store_Customer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_KANUDSDEPARTMENT_030_C.text:
That sad, witless girl must think those
mushrooms are somehow more natural
because they're caked with mud! What a simple creature to fall for
a crass sales ploy such as that.
Oh, but it breaks my heart.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
To sing, or not to sing,
that is the question.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Uh, how is that even a question?
If you want to sing, belt it out!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Hark, and who is this soothsayer that appears
before me? For while I know you not, I cannot
deny that your words ring most true. For you see, my muse has now urged me forward
in the belief that our next performance should
be one of song! Not that I will be doing the
singing, mind; we have performers for that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
And who was that muse but you,
O magnificent stranger! Now hasten to me, and quickly! We must finish
this song before the spark of creativity strikes
tinder and burns away—and it is your divine
duty to see this task through!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: Uhhh... Okay?
