SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you ready, my muse?
If so, step forward!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
The sun comes up and morning calls.
Without you, I cannot go on.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: Can you find your way back to me?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I should go to Giant Moch Forest
and never look back!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Fantastique! Truly, you are a messenger
of the muses—now pray continue!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
The sun rises away,
above me so far.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I must bear the dark
as night falls.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I gotta go home now because the
vultures are, um...screeching.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah. Ahhh! Wonderful!
I stand at my zenith!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I howl in the black!
I'm fiercer than dawn!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
C'mere, Golden Baum. I'm gonna hop
on you so we can ride awaaaaaay!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: And I cross the darkness alone.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text: Oh! Ohhhh! Ohhhh...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Holy wow! I didn't think he'd...
Yeah. Wow.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
I have completed a lyrical masterwork,
and my next show is bound to be
a great success on every level. You have discharged your divine duty
this day, my muse, and I am blessed
to have met you!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Mmm. I fear I may have let my excitement get
the better of me. But in the cold light of day,
so to speak, perhaps I'll...skip the singing?
Mmm, yes. Definitely skipping the singing.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Success demands ever greater success,
for the hunger of men knows no bounds.
Alas, but how am I to satisfy both
with my next song?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
You should just do whatever
you feel like doing!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Oh, if only it were so simple, stranger!
For to reignite the dim flames of creativity,
I am about to do no less than sell my very
soul to the devil!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
And from the way you abruptly appeared
out of nowhere, I can only conclude that
you are, in fact, the devil's servant. So inspire me, demon! And when my masterwork
is complete, you may lay my still-beating
heart at your master's cloven feet!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
I don't know WHERE to start with that.
Still, I guess it wouldn't do any harm
to play along for a little bit...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
But soft! Can you hear it?
The beating of my heart?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
The dream of that night haunts me.
Haunts soul. Haunts heart. Haunts flesh.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
My soul is bouncing up and down
like a giant Maggot Ball!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, I would expect no less
from the devil's thrall!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
For you know the truth:
they hold dominion over all.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
So I'll head toward that creepy
Gelatinous Matter over there.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Behold that accursed sky! Behold the
accursed souls quivering in terror!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, why do the poisoned whispers of
a demon make my heart sing so!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
We return from whence we came,
come to greet the true king.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Joy as we cling to victory at the
battle's end! Emerge, O destiny!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
There's no shame in retreat. See the hope
within the sunflowers abloom in our souls.
We won't part from this world.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text: Heh. Ha ha. AAAH HA HA HA HA HA HA!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text: Well, cripes. Maybe the devil really has taken this fella's soul?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
If this be purgatory, I've nothing
to fear—for Virgil and Homer will
surely be here with me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
I'm pretty sure this is Avalon,
actually. Also, are you okay?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, 'tis the devil's grim attendant—
and yet, I still feel my heart beat
safely within my chest!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Well, I have penned a masterpiece that could
stir even a demon's blackened soul, so I pray
you leave my heart intact until the performance
is ended. I will, of course, pay the necessary
interest to extend our contract.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
But for now, we must prepare for rehearsal!
There are props to make! Arclights to spark!
Scrims to fly in! Costumes to sew!
THEATRE TO CREATE!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
Wow, look how much he's enjoying this!
That's nice to see.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
My creation has failed. The devil has reneged on
his end of the bargain, and I am under no further
obligation to yield my heart. So take this to your
vile master instead, demon! Take it and go!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Writer
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
As if I could merely sell my soul to
the devil for a masterpiece—this world
is not so tepid as all that! But when I think how close I came to losing
the favour of my muse... Well, never again!
I must endure suffering and again confront
the blank page head-on!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDTHEATER_010_CUT_0.text:
I guess this stuff isn't easy...
Well, good luck!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Allo there, milady! Welcome to Sorries,
Avalon's most out-RAGEOUS store!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text: Oh? What's so outrageous about it?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Never 'eard of Sorries, eh, milady?
Well, not to worry, not to worry—just
stuff one of our famous eel pies in yer
own pie hole and you'll be sorted!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
I didn't think I'd have
to fight over it!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Well that's what it takes to get yer
gob on the freshest of eels, innit!? And 'ere you are, one of Sorries'
world-famous, fresh-baked eel pies!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_000_CUT_0.text:
Sorry ya didn't get yerself an
eel pie there. Do come again!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
'Allo there, milady! Welcome to Sorries,
Avalon's most out-RAGEOUS store!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
Right then, 'ere ya go!
One Surprise-ade, on the 'ouse!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text: I guess I WAS thirsty. Thanks!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
It's new, it's now, it's Surprise-ade!
What 'appens after ya drink it down?
Only one way to find out!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
Huh? What was that explosion...?
Nooo! One of my items was destroyed!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
This is good! Like, surprisingly good!
What's in this, anyway?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Avalon_Doorman
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_SAULEYSSTORE_010_CUT_0.text:
It's a SURPRISE, milady! But trust me,
yer better off not knowin'. Now 'ere—have another for the road!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
Be welcome here, lostling. Take all the
time you like, or hurry on to your destiny—
for those who control their own means
of conveyance control time itself.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
Your transport tickets are no mere scraps of
paper—and this clock tower does so much more
than simply inform people of the time! Yes, time and movement—these are the
constituent elements of our universe.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
If one can control time and movement,
one's objectives can always be obtained! And with that, pray permit me to convert
your transport tickets into other tickets
of equal and equivalent value. Cheers!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
Begging your pardon, madam, but I don't
believe you have enough tickets.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_000_C.text:
Excellent, madam.
Then these are for you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_END_0.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_END_0.text:
Do come again, madam! This clock tower
is always open for lostlings.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text:
Be welcome here, lostling. Take all the
time you like, or hurry on to your destiny—
for those who control their own means
of conveyance control time itself.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text:
Here I can convert your transport tickets into
other tickets of equal and equivalent value.
The only condition is that you are restricted
to but a single conversion per visit.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text:
That said, you do not appear to possess
the tickets necessary for conversion.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.speaker: Clock_Tower_Keeper
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_BASE_CLOCK_TOWER_NO_IT.text:
Should you wish to continue this transaction,
you'll need courage enough to part with either
one of your valuables or a fragment of your life.
Would you care to do so now?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: Another city slumbers beneath the mean streets of Avalon—and I'm not speaking of the sewers! No, I speak of a place below the sewers, where the ruins of an ancient metropolis lie.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: And this is the entrance?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Quite so, quite so. But just who built
that city, and what is its relationship
to present-day Avalon? Our investigation will illuminate
these truths and a good many more,
should such be of interest to you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: Of course it would!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: I literally could not care less.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
A shame young folks these days don't
give a ripe fig for archaeology...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wonderful! I've been waiting for someone
like you to show. I'll just leave the
exploration of the ruins to you, then?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wow, real-life ruins... So exciting!
Now which way should I go?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: I sense some relics over here!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: I sense some fiends over here!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Hey, I got a relic! How cool!
I should report back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Looks like I could keep going,
but which way?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
I need to get back to the surface,
but all I've done so far is fight fiends.
I haven't found anything fun at all!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: Nope. Time to go back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text: Let's keep going!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Hmm... Could this be a relic?
Well, I'd better head back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Your help in surveying the ruins has been
greatly appreciated, and we would like
to present you with this small token
of our gratitude.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
I say, are you well!? Don't push yourself,
dear lady; if someone were to die surveying
these ruins, we'd certainly lose our permit.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, I see you've found a relic!
Please take this as your reward.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well now, this doesn't fit the historical
period of the underground metropolis at all.
Wherever did you come across this?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
I kicked a fiend's butt in the ruins
and it dropped it.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_000_CUT_000_.text:
Fascinating! I wager the creature
must have brought it here from
some other place. Well, it's nothing to do with
our research, so you are welcome
to keep it if you like.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: Another city slumbers beneath the mean streets of Avalon—and I'm not speaking of the sewers! No, I speak of a place below the sewers, where the ruins of an ancient metropolis lie. However, there is an issue...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: Let me guess—it's full of fiends?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: No, we've run out of funding.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Oh. Well, I don't know anything
about that, so byeeeeee!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Wait, please! I'm not asking for a charitable
donation, madam, but merely an investment!
Even a small one would suffice—and I'll see
to it you receive an appropriate return.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
And what would this
'appropriate return' be?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, I'm certain we'll turn something up.
We always do! It's just that... Well,
there are two problems, actually. First, some sod came along and nicked what we
dug up, so we need to get that back. But more
urgently, our digging permit is quite limited,
and we can't afford to waste even a single day.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
A thousand thank-yous, my dear lady!
I'll see to it that you receive a fine
commendation from the Albion
Archaeological Society!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
If your time's so limited, are you sure
you want to waste it on that?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Of course, of course! Oh, and as you are
our generous benefactor in this endeavour,
you will determine how far down we go.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Now then! This is the entrance to the ruins,
and there should still be many fine items
to find here. What say you?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: This is far enough.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: Nope! Deeper!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
We have arrived at the centre of the ruins,
a location where we have found some truly
rare items in the recent past.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
This is the deepest portion of the ruins.
Even I have rarely ventured down so far,
for it is quite the perilous place.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
What ho! A relic! Here, my dear lady—
this should provide an appropriate
return on your investment.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text: Oh, I can't wait until my latest paper is published in Archaeology Today— and it's all thanks to you!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Heavens, but this place is dangerous!
We'd best give up and head home.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Those last fiends must have dropped this.
Guess I'll just hold on to it?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Avalon_Archaeologist
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_UNDERCITY_010_CUT_000_.text:
Heavens, but that was a proper nightmare!
I don't think you're suited for investing,
young lady—you take far too many risks.
So please just try to be satisfied with this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
Ho there, young lady! You're a tourist, yes?
If so, I invite you to enjoy one of my
many poems about the kingdom of Albion!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
Wait, you're a robot.
What's happening?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
As per your request, I shall now
perform 'Ser Galahad and the Ice Sword.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
Uh, I didn't request that.
Didn't request anything, actua—

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
Brave and bold Ser Galahad
His golden hair a'flutter
Did bravely reach the dragon's nest
That made all others shudder. He lopped the vile beast's head clean off
With the Ice Sword in his hand
And thus did the name of Galahad
Ring out throughout the land!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
I have just performed one of the
60,419 poems in my repertoire and
will gratefully accept my fee.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
Hey! What did you just
snatch away from me!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text:
Jokes on you, scammer!
I don't HAVE anything!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_000_CUT_00.text: Then piss off and never come back!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
Having a machine recite poetry sure is wild.
I wonder what it's going to perform?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
As per your request, I shall now
perform 'Ser Galahad and the Ice Sword.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
Whoa, the scenery around me is changing.
The machine must be doing that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text: Uh, and it looks like I have to fight?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_010_CUT_00.text:
Hey, that machine thing
isn't even here anymore!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_020_CUT_00.text:
As per your request, I shall now
perform 'An Ode to Ser Lancelot.'

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_020_CUT_00.text:
Ser Lancelot is Albion's pride
So brave and bold and true.
Whenever the kingdom is in peril
The stout knight does come through. But now, alas! A dragon comes!
Breathing flames of fire!
He must fell the beast to save his king
Or Albion shall expire!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text:
Hey! You! What the heck did
you do to me last time!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text:
I know exactly what you're planning,
so stop it right now!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text:
You're gonna try and make me
fight again, aren't you!?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text:
Lancelot, lifting his spear arm high,
Slew the dragon with a swing
And leaving the fell beast on the ground
Ran on to save his king!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text: ...Nothing weird? NOTHING? Oh. Sorry I accused you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.speaker: Mech_Bard
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_ROYALPALACE_030_CUT_00.text:
If you are satisfied, I will now
gratefully accept my fee.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_000_.text: Hey! All my stuff is gone!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.text: Get yer hands off me, ya nutter!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_PICKPOCKET_010_.text: This is MY stuff, you weirdo!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_STATION_PICKPOCKET_000.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_STATION_PICKPOCKET_000.text:
Look like you got a bit of rubbish
on your back there, mate. Yoink!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_STATION_PICKPOCKET_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_STATION_PICKPOCKET_000.text:
...Huh? Hey! All the items
I collected are GONE!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_STATION_PICKPOCKET_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_STATION_PICKPOCKET_010.text:
Tch! You need to work harder there,
ya skiver. Here, have this.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_STATION_PICKPOCKET_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_STATION_PICKPOCKET_010.text:
Oh, it must have been one of those
'pickpocket' thieves I heard about!
Lucky I wasn't carrying anything
I really cared about anyway.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.text:
Hi there. Hey. Mind giving me back
all the stuff you took from me?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.text:
Yeah, I'm actually a lostling, and I have to
gather items of value to pay tribute to the
king or they won't let me look for my cat.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.text:
So you're a lostling. Well, la-di-da!
Still got no idea what yer on about,
and I can't give back what I ain't got.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_000.text: Fine then! I'll just TAKE 'em back!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
This new lostling of yours is a
right pain in the arse, Spear.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
Caught in the act, eh, Sylvester?
Well, too bad for you.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
What we have here, miss, is a dodgy
pickpocket by the name of Sylvester. Deftest hands in all of Avalon, they say—
and I swear it's true, because I've not
once caught her in the act. But seems like you were able to make a
proper go of it! That's some fine work,
miss. Some fine work indeed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
Bad look for the Avalon rozzers if they
need strangers to be doin' their jobs!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
Keep wailing, Sylvester—we'll have
you singing like a bird for the rest
of your crimes soon enough.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
For now, the Yard will confiscate all your
belongings to use as evidence against you—
after which, you'll be expected to repay
your victims for every item you nicked.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_010.text:
Phew! Now I shouldn't have to
worry about thieves anymore.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_020.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_020.text:
You sure act smug for such a shabby
lookin' foreigner, lostling!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_020.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_000_CUT_020.text:
But let's start over.
Here's what you're owed from me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.text:
You're not getting away this time
until I have all my stuff back!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.text:
I don't know if you're playing dumb or have
actually forgotten, but you made a lostling
angry, and that's a HUUUGE mistake!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_000.text:
Fine then! Maybe a good spanking
will refresh your memory!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_010.text:
Bloody hell, lady! Looks like I pushed
ya too far and woke the beast.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_020.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_010_CUT_020.text: Yer a right nutter, you are.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.text:
Out of jail already? What's this,
your little attempt at revenge?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_000.text:
Talk about brazen! Although I'm a lostling,
so I guess I can't blame you for being at
least a LITTLE curious about me.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.text:
Don't go thinkin' you beat me,
lostling. 'Cause ya didn't!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.text:
Hey, what's the deal? You made this
big whoo-ha about catching Sylvester,
but she's already out of jail!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.text:
Yes, I'm afraid that's one of the
more shameful aspects of Avalon—
or all of Albion itself, rather.
Afraid I can't say more than that. Still, you'll be compensated for your
losses, so you'll just have to try and
be satisfied with that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_010.text:
Well, this is your world, so I won't mess
with your business. But don't expect me to
take it next time it blows up in my face!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_020.speaker: Sylvester
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_PICKPOCKET_020_CUT_020.text:
Oi! Looks like ol' Sylvester got
the better of you this time, numpty!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Here at the royal market, we have everything
under the sun. Now all your shopping needs
can be handled at one convenient stop!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_000_010.text:
And for those who aren't looking to shop,
our famous Punch-Up Club is open as well—
and we're accepting all comers! If you've faith in your fists, come give us
your best; our trained fighters stand ready
to trade blows with all worthy adversaries!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I give you the pirate Silver,
Conqueror of the Seven Seas!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_000_030.text:
*sigh* Looks like I'll have to enroll
in this so-called club... Hey! Over here! This lostling will
accept your challenge!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_000_040.text:
My, my! A bold young challenger has appeared!
Seems they call this one 'The Lostling.'
Just take a care you don't get lost
on your way to the ring, lass!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Unbelievable! The Conqueror of the
Seven Seas has fallen to The Lostling!
Let's give them a proper hand for putting
up such a brave fight, lads. Oh, and you get a participation award
there, mate, so don't be disappointed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_010_010.text:
As for The Lostling, her day has just begun!
Now behold your next challenger:
the Warrior-hero Boudica!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_010_020.text:
Well, lass? What do you say?
Audience is frothing to see a
proper fight between you two.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Fine, then! Take your winner's award
and get the hell out of here! Oi, did you hear that, lads!? Little lady
lostling wants to find her mummy and go home!
Let her have it! I want boos to rain down on
her from now to St. Swithin's Day!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_010_060.text:
And our winner is the pirate Silver, Conqueror
of the Seven Seas! Let's give The Lostling a big
hand for fighting so bravely, eh, lads? Oh, and you get a participation award
there, lass, so don't be disappointed.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_020_000.text:
Blimey, I can't believe it! The Warrior-
hero Boudica has fallen to The Lostling! Let's give Boudica a proper hand for almost
turning that one around, eh, lads? Ah, but
life is cruel, so you'll only be walking
away with a participation award.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_020_010.text:
Right then, ladies and gents!
Who wants to see The Lostling
put up her mitts one more time?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_020_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_020_020.text:
Well then, consider yourselves a bunch of
lucky jammie dodgers, because the market
is about to hold a very special event! You're up for this, eh, Lostling?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_020_050.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_020_050.text:
That's what I wanted to hear!
Now prepare to battle the champion
of the Royal Market Punch-Up Club...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_020_070.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_020_070.text:
And our winner is the Warrior-hero Boudica!
Let's give The Lostling a big hand for
putting up a right brave scrap, eh, lads? Ah, but life is cruel, so you'll only
walk away with a participation award.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_030_000.text:
Blimey, but this one's strong as anything!
Truly a worthy champion, wouldn't you say, lads?
Now let's blow the roof off the building for
the newest champion of the Royal Market!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Come see us again sometimes, eh?
Having the champion around always gets
people excited for the Punch-Up Club!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_000_CUT_030_030.text:
The Lostling put up quite the fight there,
eh, lads? Let's all give her a big
hand for all her hard work! Ah, but life is cruel, so you'll only walk
away with a participation award. Hope you
can avoid getting lost long enough to
find us for a rematch! Bwa ha ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome to the Royal Market,
Avalon's premier shopping destination.
Please enjoy all we have to offer.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_000_020.text:
I give you now Avalon's most
hated man...The Yob!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_000_040.text:
But a brave challenger has appeared,
one all of us know as...The Lostling!
Hopefully she can shop without losing
her way—or pay us even if she does! Ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_010_000.text:
It's over, lads! It's all over!
The hated Yob has been defeated
by The Lass Who Gets Lost in Shops! Now let's all jeer the Yob, eh?
No participation award for you, Yobber!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_010_010.text:
Right then, Lass Who Gets Lost in Shops!
You may have won a single morning match,
but another challenge awaits you:
Rodrigo the Veteran Hero!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_010_020.text:
Well, lass? What do you say?
Audience is frothing to see a
proper fight between you two.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_010_050.text:
Fine, then! Take your winner's award
and get the hell out of here! Oi, did you hear that, lads!? The Lass Who
Gets Lost in Shops has lost her bloody nerve!
Let her have it! I want boos to rain down
on her from now to St. Swithin's Day!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_010_060.text:
And our winner is the Yob! The blasted Yob!
Let's all boo the hell out of The Lass Who
Gets Lost in Shops for dashing our hopes! Blimey, I'm so cheesed off, I'm not
even giving you a participation award!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_020_000.text:
Unbelievable! Rodrigo the Veteran Hero
has fallen to The Lass Who Gets
Lost in Shops! Ah, but life is cruel, so Rodrigo only
walks away with a participation award.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_020_010.text:
Right then, ladies and gents! Who wants
to see The Lass Who Gets Lost in Shops
put up her mitts one more time?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_020_020.text:
Well then, consider yourselves a bunch of
lucky jammie dodgers, because the market
is about to hold a very special event! You're up for this, eh,
Lass Who Gets Lost in Shops?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_020_070.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_020_070.text:
And our winner is Rodrigo the Veteran Hero!
Let's give The Lass Who Gets Lost in Shops
a hand for putting up a right brave scrap. Ah, but life is cruel, so you'll only
walk away with a participation award.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_030_000.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_030_000.text:
Blimey, but this one's strong as anything!
Truly a worthy champion, wouldn't you say, lads?
Now let's blow the roof off the building for
the newest champion of the Royal Market!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_030_030.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_010_CUT_030_030.text:
The Lass Who Gets Lost in Shops put up quite
the fight there, eh, lads? Let's all give her
a big hand for all her hard work! Ah, but life is cruel, so you'll only walk
away with a participation award. Hope you
can avoid getting lost long enough to
find us for a rematch! Bwa ha ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Now this may seem a touch abrupt...
but it's rematch time! You and me!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_020_CUT_000_020.text: Oi! I've done it! You're brown bread, and I've reclaimed the title! Thanks for a proper fight... former champ! Bwa ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Market_Master
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_MARKET_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Blimey, she cuffed me around again!
I gotta get back to training...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This is a hospital, which means
only two types of people come here:
the sick and the injured.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
As you clearly are not injured,
one can only assume you are sick.
We shall operate straightaway.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text: Exactly what a sick person would say. Because of the brain lesions, you see.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Hey, there's nothing wrong with my brain!
...Well, my teachers might say otherwise,
but there's sure as heck no lesions!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Do just lie back and keep calm, dear.
You'll barely feel a poke, and we'll
have you out of here lickity-split!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Aaand...done! Yes, it seems this
operation was a smashing success.
I'll prepare your discharge papers.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
What the heck just happened to me? 
I can't remember anything, yet I feel...
strangely great? No, I feel AMAZING!
Better than I've felt in forever!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh dear. It appears you're wounded.
We'll need to treat that at once.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text:
As you do not appear to be either,
we will gladly accept a small
donation of your blood.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text:
You keep your sharpy bits
away from me, freak!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Do just lie back and keep calm, dear.
You'll barely feel a poke, and we'll
have you out of here lickity-split!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_010_CUT_000_0.text:
We thank you for your
precious plasma.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
Excuse me, I'd like to know how
to get to the cemetery in back.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
The only ones with business in a cemetery
are corpses. We have a hospital right here
for the living, which you most clearly are.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
But a dead body COULD go back there?
Er, I mean, how exactly do people who die
at this hospital get to the cemetery?
I mean, they don't walk, right? Ha ha!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Avalon_Nurse
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
After being taken to the morgue,
they're carted off to the cemetery.
But you're too young to have to
worry about things like that.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_HOSPITAL_020_CUT_000_0.text:
Ah, the morgue! And no one's around...
So if I just pretend to be dead for a
while, someone will come along and
haul my corpse off to the cemetery!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Okay, I made it into the cemetery!
Now to find something that's connected
to those triangular thingies...

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Hey there. You know of any graves that
are related to this triangle pattern?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Grave_Digger
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So you're the errand girl, eh?
Just look for this seal.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So I just slot the pieces I've
collected right into here?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text: Do you really want to give up?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_0.text: Yeah, this is a waste of time.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Clearly I won't be getting this
out of here so easily.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_CEMETERY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Is this what Inspector Spear needed?
Guess I'll bring it over to him.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.text:
Come all this way just to give us a donation,
didja? 'Cuz I can't imagine why else you'd 
come all the soddin' way out 'ere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, well, boys! Looks like we got
us a right philanthropist 'ere!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.text:
Got ourselves a right wazzock 'ere,
ain't we? Time to teach this bird
'ow things work in this country!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_000.text:
The only wazzock here is YOU!
Uh, that IS a bad thing, right?

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.text:
Come all this way just to give us a donation,
didja? 'Cuz I can't imagine why else you'd 
come all the soddin' way out 'ere.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.text:
Oi, one ha'penny. One round ha'penny
to awaken me inner strength!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_100_CUT_000.text:
Did this triangular thingie turn them
into werewolves? Wow. Better take it
with me just to be safe.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_000.text: I think my cat is up there!

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_12.speaker: Spear
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_OPENING_310_CUT_000_12.text:
Make for Avalon Yard.
Don't worry; this won't end
with you in a jail cell.

SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_010.speaker: Avalon_Gang
SUB_W09_EVAR_AMYA_JACKSTREET_000_CUT_010.text:
Oi, how is it ya got nothin' on ya!?
Thanks for wastin' me time!
